name: Fool's Trail Cutting
description: Replicates the Trail Cutting effect from 2.1.

cutting-freq.name: Cutting Frequency
cutting-freq.description:
Defines how often the trail cuts, <cp>lower value = faster cutting!</c>

<cl>0.2 by default gives the closest result to the original visual, but could cause long periods of time where the trail remains unaffected.</c>

<cr>Values above 0.3 can be too slow.</c>
